label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the subscribers of an event post if the event is cancelled or has to be postponed (the system cannot fully delete events so instead the event will be hidden).
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##Title## - Title of event
##NotifierFullName## - Name of the creator of the event
##FullName## - Name of the subscriber receiving the notification

template.subject: Default template subject
template.body: Default template content, yeah. Have an awesome day!
